title: Anandabhairavi anaiyum
sahitya:
Anandabhairavi anaiyun tiruvaDi malariNai tuNaiyE shankari shiv-


anupallavi

  mInam tannai nighar nIL karuNai vizhiyAl nOkki vinai nIkki aruL param-


caraNam    anaittuyiraiyum Inra jaganmAtA iLam kumari gowri varai
arashanarum pudalvi hari sOdari apAra krpAkari unait tozhum
enadu vinait-tiraL aghala uLLanbODu kaDaikkaN pArAi un
karuNaittuLi illaiyEl Ezhaik-kulagil vEru AdhAram Edu amba
